name: The Glass Dome's Beta (Beta Edition)
description:
"The Glass Dome's Beta (Beta Edition)" is a game made for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0.

You are just wrapping up code on the new Glass Dome Asteroid Defense System and AI Beta™ when a bunch of asteroid-holes decide that now's a good time to pick a fight with earth. The system's AI starts to combat them, but that's when the bugs start to show...

Keep in mind that this was made while I was on a trip, so take it with a grain of salt.

Controls:

Keyboard.

Mouse.

Hands.
